greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = (n mod 2) if n <= 3, otherwise a(n) = (n^2-5n+7)*(n-2)*a(n-1)/(n-3) + (n^2-5n+7)*a(n-2) - (n-2)*a(n-3)/(n-3).
comment: Terms are squares; square roots give A001053.
reference: M. E. Larsen, Summa Summarum, A. K. Peters, Wellesley, MA, 2007; see p. 35.
link: S. B. Ekhad, Problem 10356, Amer. Math. Monthly, 101 (1994), 75.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 30 2009
ext: Typo in name corrected by _Rogério Serôdio_, Apr 04 2018
